title: Client is kicking me out of Champ Select
body: The Client loves to not tell me to accept a ready match or kick me out of Champ Select. I don't know if the Client hates it when I alt+tab or change windows, or what, but I just got kicked out of two Champ Selects in a row, the second time I was looking at the Champ Select itself.

replies.body:
Since this is happening while you *aren't* Alt+Tabbed out as well as when you are, this is likely caused by a *poor connection* to the PvP.net service, which is in charge of delivering those notifications to you. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) covers the most common solutions for this, so I recommend following the steps as a start.

Let me know if this helped.
